text: Stephan Beckenbauer (1 December 1968 – 1 August 2015) was a German footballer, born in Munich. He was a son of Franz Beckenbauer. He played with FC Bayern Munich. He also played for 1. FC Saarbrücken. Beckenbauer was latterly a scout and coach with Bayern Munich. Beckenbauer died in Munich on 1 August 2015, after a long illness, aged 46. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Bavaria Category:German football managers Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from Munich
title: Stephan Beckenbauer
